summary:
HOPPY - HOPPY ON ETHEREUM! We bring innovation and confidence to you, ​join our community and let's make the OG ​PEPE on Ethereum!

 In Matt Furie’s glorious debut - In Matt Furie’s glorious debut, a nocturnal ​frog and rat awake at midnight, share a salad of lettuce and bugs, and ​strike out on an epic dirtbike adventure ​toward the sunrise. As the friends make their way from ​forest to bat cave to ghost town to ocean ​to shore and beyond, new friends are discovered, a huge crab is ​narrowly avoided, and a world is revealed. Packed with colorful characters and ​surprising details on every hand-drawn page, The Night Riders is the ideal book for ​anyone who has ever wanted to surf to the ​mountains on the back of a dolphin.

 CA - 0x6e79b51959cf968d87826592f46f819f92466615
